column2: Mrs. Deadpool and the Howling Commandos (2015) #4
column6: • The battle royale between Shiklah and Dracula for the Monster Metropolis... • Oh, and did we mention that Deadpool's ghost is in this series? • Because he is. • Like...since issue 1.
column8: | penciller (cover):Reilly Brown | writer:Gerry Duggan | artist:Salvador Espin
